Name: Slayer Cat
About the game: Slayer Cat is a classic action shooter game that combines hand-drawn drawings with classic gameplay. Inspired by games like Contra, Doom, and Cuphead. Play as The Slayer Cat as you traverse strange places on an enemy planet, get new weapons, improve your powers, and discover who is behind the evil creations of that planet!
